document.full_text: dillon gee made the game a little more exciting than usual, throwing five and two-thirds innings of no-hit ball as the mets edged the washington nationals.
document.title: mets 1, nationals 0: nothing new as no-hit bid again teases mets
lines_and_colors: dillon gee made the game a little more exciting than usual, throwing five and two-thirds innings of no-hit ball as the mets edged the washington nationals.
